findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract allows unauthorized upgrades to its scripts.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The owner can mint tokens after initial contract creation/deployment.

findings.title: removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function due to fee-on-transfer token support.

findings.title: removeLiquidityETHWithPermitSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in removeLiquidityETHWithPermitSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function due to fee-on-transfer token support.

findings.title: swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: This function may be vulnerable to fee-on-transfer tokens, which can cause unexpected behavior.

findings.title: swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability due to supporting fee-on-transfer tokens.

findings.title: swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: The function swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens is marked as external and may be vulnerable to reentrancy attacks or other security issues.

findings.title: excludeFromReward
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function has a vulnerability.

findings.title: Unprotected External Function 'includeInReward'
findings.description: The external function 'includeInReward' has no access restriction and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: excludeFromFee
findings.description: The excludeFromFee function allows the owner to exclude a wallet from fees, potentially leading to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Exclude Multiple Accounts From Max Wallet
findings.description: The smart contract does not exclude multiple accounts from max wallet, allowing non-whitelisted wallets to hold more tokens than specified.

findings.title: includeInFee
findings.description: Potential vulnerability found in includeInFee function allowing owner to manipulate fees.

findings.title: Unprotected createPair Function
findings.description: The createPair function in IUniswapV2Factory interface is declared as external and lacks access control, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: setFeeTo
findings.description: External function setFeeTo has been identified as a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: setFeeToSetter
findings.description: The setFeeToSetter function has a potential vulnerability.
